channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
Hello Mopar,
I was wondering how i would fix some models in my client, skill cape ones... they are team capes but not skill capes, how would i add the correct models to the client?
& another thing, weapon timers (Like the DDS) i wanted to change it so it would hit correctly & on time like it should,
Yes i'm using a DeltaScape base.
Thanks for reading -
Lewis.
